attributes.action: Call a General Election due to the current chaos of the current government.
attributes.background: This government has been chaotic since Boris’ Resignation. There has been more public scandals due to Partygate videos and the current enquiry. I believe that the Prime Minister should call a general election to let the public to decide who should lead the country during these times.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631901
Call a General Election
